class.name: YSaveable3D
class.brief_description: A node that enables automatic saving and loading of 3D scene nodes with their transforms and metadata.
class.description:
YSaveable3D is a helper node that works in conjunction with [YSave] to automatically save and load 3D scene nodes. When added as a child to a Node3D, it will: - Save the node's position, rotation, and scale - Save all metadata attached to the node - Handle automatic loading and spawning of saved nodes - Manage cleanup of saved nodes during scene transitions
Example of basic usage: [codeblock] # In your scene setup: var saveable_node = YSaveable3D.new() your_3d_node.add_child(saveable_node)
# Add metadata to be saved your_3d_node.set_meta("health", 100) your_3d_node.set_meta("inventory", ["sword", "shield"])
# The node's transform and metadata will be automatically saved # when YSave.request_save() is called [/codeblock]
The node will automatically save: - Global position ("p") - Global rotation ("r") if different from original - Scale ("s") if different from original - Node name ("n") if not an internal name - Scene path ID ("scn") for proper instantiation - All metadata that doesn't start with "_"

method.name: _on_load_save
method.description:
Virtual method called when saved values are loaded. Override this method to handle custom loading logic.
[param saved_values] contains all the saved data for this node, including transforms and metadata.

method.name: _on_prepare_save
method.description:
Virtual method called before saving. Override this method to add custom save logic or prevent saving.
Return [code]false[/code] to prevent the node from being saved, [code]true[/code] to proceed with saving. [param save_values] contains the current values to be saved, which can be modified before saving.

method.name: cleanup_all_saved_nodes
method.description: Static method that triggers cleanup of all YSaveable3D nodes in the scene tree. This is typically called during scene transitions or when resetting the game state.

method.name: load_all_saved_nodes
method.description: Static method that loads and spawns all saved nodes from the current save data. This should be called after loading a save file to restore the saved game state.

method.name: set_spawn_under_node
method.description: Sets the parent node under which saved nodes will be spawned when loading. If not set, nodes will be spawned under the current scene root.
